nodes.name: Set Input Parameters
nodes.notes:
Device onboarding workflow parameters:
- method: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- onboardingId: Specific onboarding job ID
- deviceId: Target device for onboarding
- status: Filter by status (pending, in-progress, completed, failed, cancelled)
- template: Onboarding template to use
- autoApprove: Auto-approve onboarding steps (true/false)
- body: JSON body with device details, credentials, config

parameters.url: ={{ $env.GLUWARE_API_URL }}/onboarding{{ $('Build Query String').item.json.onboardingId ? '/' + $('Build Query String').item.json.onboardingId : '' }}{{ $('Build Query String').item.json.queryString || '' }}

nodes.name: GET Onboarding
nodes.notes:
Retrieves onboarding jobs:
- All jobs or specific by ID
- Filter by device, status, or template
- Returns job progress and logs

parameters.url: ={{ $env.GLUWARE_API_URL }}/onboarding{{ $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.onboardingId ? '/' + $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.onboardingId : '' }}{{ $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.autoApprove === 'true' ? '?autoApprove=true' : '' }}

nodes.name: POST/PUT/DELETE Onboarding
nodes.notes:
Onboarding operations:
- POST: Start new onboarding job
- PUT: Update job (approve step, retry, etc.)
- DELETE: Cancel onboarding job

nodes.name: Format Success Response
nodes.notes: Formats onboarding response with progress tracking and statistics

nodes.name: Format Error Response
nodes.notes: Formats error with failed step information if applicable

nodes.name: Validate Input
nodes.notes: Validates onboarding parameters, credentials, and required fields
